recipe.title: Habanero-Orange Salsa
ingredients: 1/4 cup very thinly sliced red onion
instructions: Cut peel and pith from oranges. Working over medium bowl, cut between membranes to release segments. Add cilantro, red onion, olive oil, red wine vinegar, and habanero chile; toss well. Season with salt and pepper. DO AHEAD: Can be made 1 day ahead. Cover and chill.
